title: My PBE account is inactive where can I activate it?
body: Hey guys. I've been on the PBE for around 2-3 years or so and recently they had us verify our e-mail addresses and I did just that but the problem here is that it doesn't let me see where to activate my account or change my password and such. Can I get any help with this here? If so thanks a bunch.

replies.body: My PBE got deactivated too, how can i have my access back? {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

It looks like you currently have an active PBE account, so you just need to sign in!  If you need help with recovery, our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide can help!  If you still need help recovering access, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll help you out individually.  Hope that helps!
Hi Porocles thanks for replying. I asked for a ticket and I tried signing in how you asked me but that doesn't seem to work. Any help is appreciated!
